name: Image
description: Represents an Image. An Image can be a direct child of a PageContent object or a Paragraph object.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the Image object.

properties.name: paragraph
properties.description: Gets the Paragraph object that contains the Image. Throws if the Image is not a direct child of a Paragraph.

properties.name: pageContent
properties.description: Gets the PageContent object that contains the Image. Throws if the Image is not a direct child of a PageContent. This object defines the position of the Image on the page.

properties.name: description
properties.description: Gets or sets the description of the Image.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Gets or sets the height of the Image layout.

properties.name: hyperlink
properties.description: Gets or sets the hyperlink of the Image.

properties.name: ocrData
properties.description: Gets the data obtained by OCR (Optical Character Recognition) of this Image, such as OCR text and language.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Gets or sets the width of the Image layout.

methods.name: getBase64Image
methods.description: Gets the base64-encoded binary representation of the Image.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
